title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When clicking Finish in the JAR packager wizard, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: After clicking Finish in the JAR packager wizard, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
EB: To create a JAR with unsaved editors, the user should be allowed to save by quitting the wizard, saving the files, opening the wizard again, and then entering all the fields again. Alternatively, there should be a dialog that allows the user to save before creating the JAR.
